headline: Jefferies Sees Steady Performance at Honeywell International Inc. (HON), Raises PT to $240
summary: Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) is included among the 13 Best Roth IRA Stocks to Buy Now. On February 3, Jefferies raised its price recommendation on Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) to $240 from $220. It maintained a Hold rating on the stock. The firm described the quarter as solid, noting 6% organic growth and 2026 organic […]

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Honeywell International (HON) After Its Recent Share Price Surge
summary: If you are wondering whether Honeywell International's share price still offers fair value after a strong run, this article will walk through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. At a last close of US$242.70, Honeywell has returned 3.8% over the past 7 days, 15.4% over 30 days, 23.9% year to date, 28.2% over 1 year, 37.8% over 3 years and 40.2% over 5 years. Recent attention on Honeywell has focused on how the company is positioned within capital goods and industrial...
